36daysoftype 2020 ​

36daysoftype is a marathon for desingers, illustartors and animators. Each day participants design a spicific Latin letter or digit and post it on socials. At the end of the challenge the participant has collection of 36 characters.

  • A is for ambitions that kill joy

  • B is for bunnies in a magic hat

  • C is for cellar door in Donnie Darko movie

  • D is for a distance between you and your reflection

  • E is for entropy that opposes the order

  • F is for fame that is bright and meaningless

  • G is for a gesture that makes sphinxes cry

  • H is for the humor that keeps me away from the terrors of the day

  • I is one of identities that I carry with me

  • J is for job that is never done

  • K is for knife that cuts through the time

  • L is for lies we tell to avoid embarrassment

  • M is for moth that fills our chests and promises misery

  • N is for a note that someone sticks on a fridge to cheer you up in the morning

  • O is for an oak tree that burns at a crossroad

  • P is for power of letting go

  • Q is for a queen looking in a broken mirror

  • R is for reason we can’t find

  • S is for symptoms of spiritual decay

  • T is for the thirst one cannot satisfy

  • U is for umbrella that is blown away by storm wind

  • V is for a vault filled with childhood memories and fictional trophies

  • W is a world that is empty

  • X is for x-ray of human lungs

  • Y is for yogurt on which you probably shouldn’t spend so much money

  • Z is for a zombie suite that you wear casually on weekdays

  • 0 is for the void that eats you up from the inside

  • 1 is for the only one you need

  • 2 is for two kings who adore each other

  • 3 is for a secret code of three knocks at a door

  • 4 is for four horsemen who don’t say much

  • 5 is for five blades of the morning star

  • 6 is for six rules that you need to violate to break free

  • 7 is for seven keys of luck that tend to be always lost in a living room couch

  • 8 is for eight hours of work that is torture

  • 9 is for nine planets of the Solar System but one of them is an imposter

Edition 2 ​

I wanted to redo characters that I have designed before, here is the result:

  • A is for another start

  • B is for beasts that live under the bed

  • C is for the crown of pride that is just a fort wall covering a head

  • D is for doors that are neither open nor closed

  • E is for endless sleep in the summer night

  • A is for another start

  • G is for the guests who leave too early

  • Н is for heresy

  • I is for indirect kiss

  • I is for a jaguar who infiltrated the golden city

  • K is for a knot that can’t be untied

  • L is for a longest night full of scary salesmen

  • M is for an ancient memories that lurk in the back of your mind

  • N is for the neon lights in a gas station cafe

  • O is for an order in a row of random events

  • P is for pillars of the success that don’t have ground to stand on

  • Q is for questions that don’t have answers

  • R is for a robot that I am not

  • S is for sap of a burning tree

  • T is for a tremor caused by boiling blood

  • U is for an utopia that lives in a mind of perfectionists

  • V is for vanity of being a dreamer

  • W is for warning signs of spiritual decay

  • X is for xylophone in ghost melodies

  • Y is for an youthful soul that is trapped in a decaying body

  • Z is for zinc that protects you from moonburn

  • 0 is for endlessness and emptiness of the universe

  • One is for the lonely one who is lost in mist and trees

  • 2 is for two twin brothers who look alike but disagree in everything

  • 3 is for trinity of despair

  • 4 is for forever home

  • 5 is for a pinky promise

  • 6 is for the six candles above the dying man face

  • 7 is for seven imaginary friends that never have time to call back

  • 8 is for eight symbols of a password that opens photoarchive of your long lost brother

  • 9 is for nine channels of an old TV where everybody speaks Russian
